main.name: James Smith
main.description: I am a former Chef now working in the Tech Industry
main.bio: I have learned the fundamentals of different Languages and Applications used in front and back end development. I'm looking forward to contributing to my team's success by collaboratively creating different projects and applications.
main.bio2: Working in the hectic restaurant business for the past 15 years has honed my skills in teamwork, time-management and dealing with ambiguity.  These skills have allowed me to successfully transition my career from a chef to a Full Stack Developer.

resume.resumeSummary: Looking to join a dynamic company as a Full Stack Developer. Strong interpersonal skills and proven ability to manage positive and productive teams. I have a passion to learn new technologies and create solutions to improve the user experience in websites and applications.

education.degree: Certificate in Full Stack Web Development

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Improved efficiency and readability of previously maintained code modules through code refactoring, optimization and documentation of eCommerce platform

work.title: Executive Sous Chef
work.description: At The Grille at RiverView, I helped assist the Owner and Executive Chef in all daily operations. I was in the charge of daily specials and future menu developement.

work.title: Sous Chef
work.description: At Cress I worked under multiple nominated James Beard award winning Chef Hari Pulapaka. I Helped re-open after 11 years and bring it back to its roots using local ingredients and a creative menu

testimonials.text: It is my pleasure to recommend James Smith, who I taught in the Full Stack Web Development Coding Bootcamp at the University of Central Florida. James has proved to be both a hard worker and a dedicated student. His ability to acquire new skills and improve through practice was outstanding. James always showed dedication and positive attitude when approaching new concepts and challenges during the entire length of the program. Great team player and committed to improve his skills constantly. I am confident that he will continue to display the same type of commitment and diligence in everything he does
